channel.title: Hole in map [Fixed]
channel.description:
I just find this little hole in that map which I think doesn´t look good. Even when it's hard to find
I don't know If this has been reported yet. Delete is needed.
Console 'status' and 'getpos'
[code] ] getpos setpos -3743.500488 4842.562988 614.055542;setang 47.354099 93.526100 0.000000 ] status hostname: Half-Life 2 version : 1.0.1.0/14 4104 insecure map : bm_c2a5b at: -3743 x, 4842 y, 614 z players : 1 (1 max) [/code]
Here is a close-up of what I'm talking about [img]https://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/921241021517582564/F94427D309866D6278625DB6E7C4B295408564BD/[/img]
And here is a far shot of where it is located.. Just where the crosshair is located [img]https://cloud-2.steampowered.com/ugc/921241021517631385/EB803E5EF03FB68A439202DDF65567B6B1CE89A2/[/img]

item.title: Hole in map [Fixed]
item.dc:creator: CARL95
item.description:
I just find this little hole in that map which I think doesn´t look good.
Even when it’s hard to find
